channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-12694] testTableExistsIfTheSpecifiedTableRegionIsSplitParent in TestSplitTransactionOnCluster class leaves regions in transition
item.description: There seems to a clean up issue with the unit test "testTableExistsIfTheSpecifiedTableRegionIsSplitParent" in TestSplitTransactionOnCluster class. It always has a region in transition. So any unit test that executes after that test, will cause balance method to return false.
item.summary: testTableExistsIfTheSpecifiedTableRegionIsSplitParent in TestSplitTransactionOnCluster class leaves regions in transition

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Patch for branch-1.
lgtm, master branch has this problem too, no?
Patch for master.
Patch for 98 and branch-1 after recent merges.
Test also passes for me. Thanks Vandana. Committing this in a short time

http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12687840/HBASE-12694-98.1.patch

Virag Kothari I think this broke branch-1 and there is something odd in 0.98. See here for 0.98:

https://builds.apache.org/view/H-L/view/HBase/job/HBase-0.98/751/testReport/junit/org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver/TestZKLessSplitOnCluster/testSplitHooksBeforeAndAfterPONR/

And 1.1 has zkless tests failing – which are subclasses of testsplittransactiononcluster:

https://builds.apache.org/view/H-L/view/HBase/job/HBase-1.1/6/

Seems fine in trunk.

Suggest revert from all places until it works in all places... then reapply?
Thanks for looking at the builds Stack. Reverted from all places. Can you check what is wrong Vandana Ayyalasomayajula?
